newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Taiwan buys 3,500/T May MTBE at $275-$280/T.
newsitem.headline: Taiwan buys 3,500/T May MTBE at $275-$280/T.

text.p: Taiwan's state-owned Chinese Petroleum Corp (CPC) has bought through tender 3,500 tonnes of methyl tertiary butyl ether (MTBE) for May 6-20 delivery between $275 to $280 per tonne, cost-and-freight (c-and-f) Kaohsiung and Keelung, a company official said on Tuesday.
The tender for the gasoline octane enhancer, closed March 31 and was valid until April 2.
In its last MTBE tender, CPC bought 7,000 tonnes for April 6-20 delivery from Saudi Basic Industries Corp (SABIC) at a higher price of $280-$283 per tonne c-and-f Kaohsiung and Keelung.
